pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of materials related to Hamilton's career as a designer, fashion editor, socialite and host for local radio programs, 1929-1933, on KHJ that dealt with fashion concerns of the modern woman. Includes paste-ups, scrapbooks, photographs, newspaper clippings, printed ads, radio scripts and ephemera.
